query: SELECT project_type, date_trunc_ym(date_recorded) AS month, COUNT(*) AS count WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY project_type, month ORDER BY project_type, month

date_recorded.description: The date when the parcel map was officially recorded.

count.description: Number of projects of each type recorded each month.

table_metadata.title: Pending Basemap Updates
table_metadata.description: Official parcel boundaries pending recorded Covenants, Conditions & Restrictions (CC&R) maintained by San Francisco Public Works

title: Pending Basemap Updates
